title: Population Estimates for UK, England and Wales, Scotland and Northern Ireland
summary: Estimates of the usual resident population as at 30 June 2015. This release will include national and subnational population estimates for England and Wales, and for Scotland, and national estimates for Northern Ireland. Presented as available by administrative area, single year of age, sex and components of populationÂ change.
metaDescription: Estimates of the usual resident population in the United Kingdom and its constituent countries.
